ScreenForms

Class InputException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • ScreenForms.InputException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InputException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Universal exception for handling input errors in the application with validation methods
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • validEmptyField

        public static void validEmptyField(javax.swing.JTextField[] textFields,
                                   java.lang.String[] fieldNames)
                            throws InputException
        Validates that all required fields are filled
        Parameters:
        textFields - array of text fields to validate
        fieldNames - names of the fields for error messages
        Throws:
        InputException - if any required field is empty

      • validRowNumber

        public static void validRowNumber(java.lang.String rowNumberStr,
                                  int maxRows)
                           throws InputException
        Validates row number input
        Parameters:
        rowNumberStr - the row number string to validate
        maxRows - maximum allowed row number
        Throws:
        InputException - if row number is invalid or not a number

      • validDataArray

        public static void validDataArray(java.lang.String[] data,
                                  int expectedLength)
                           throws InputException
        Validates data array for editing
        Parameters:
        data - the data array to validate
        expectedLength - expected length of the array
        Throws:
        InputException - if data array is invalid

      • validLettersOnly

        public static void validLettersOnly(java.lang.String text,
                                    java.lang.String fieldName)
                             throws InputException
        Validates that text contains only letters and spaces Allows English and Russian letters
        Parameters:
        text - the text to validate
        fieldName - the name of the field for error message
        Throws:
        InputException - if text contains non-letter characters

      • validZeroOrOne

        public static void validZeroOrOne(java.lang.String text,
                                  java.lang.String fieldName)
                           throws InputException
        Validates that text contains only numbers 0 or 1 Used for binary fields like awards (0 = no awards, 1 = has awards)
        Parameters:
        text - the text to validate
        fieldName - the name of the field for error message
        Throws:
        InputException - if text is not 0 or 1
